sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
import {
    Flex,
    Heading,
    Input,
    Button,
    FormControl,
    FormLabel,
    Switch,
    useColorMode,
    useColorModeValue,
  } from '@chakra-ui/react';
  import './form.css'
function Form() {
  return (
    <Flex h="100vh" alignItems="center" justifyContent="center">
    <Flex
      flexDirection="column"
      bg={formBackground}
      p={12}
      borderRadius={8}
      boxShadow="lg"
    >
      <Heading mb={6}>Log In</Heading>
      <Input
        placeholder="johndoe@gmail.com"
        type="email"
        variant="filled"
        mb={3}
      />
      <Input
        placeholder="**********"
        type="password"
        variant="filled"
        mb={6}
      />
      <Button colorScheme="teal" mb={8}>
        Log In
      </Button>
      <FormControl display="flex" alignItems="center">
        <FormLabel htmlFor="dark_mode" mb="0">
          Enable Dark Mode?
        </FormLabel>
        <Switch
          id="dark_mode"
          colorScheme="teal"
          size="lg"
          onChange={toggleColorMode}
        />
      </FormControl>
    </Flex>
  </Flex>
  )
}

export default Form
